AFNI-native HRF basis constructors. These functions create `AFNI_HRF` objects corresponding to AFNI’s built-in basis families.

Source: R/afni_hrf_specs.R
AFNI_HRF_constructors.Rd

AFNI-native HRF basis constructors. These functions create `AFNI_HRF` objects corresponding to AFNI’s built-in basis families.

Usage

AFNI_SPMG1(d = 1)

AFNI_SPMG2(d = 1)

AFNI_SPMG3(d = 1)

AFNI_BLOCK(d = 1, p = 1)

AFNI_dmBLOCK(d = 1, p = 1)

AFNI_TENT(b = 0, c = 18, n = 10)

AFNI_CSPLIN(b = 0, c = 18, n = 6)

AFNI_POLY(b = 0, c = 18, n = 10)

AFNI_SIN(b = 0, c = 18, n = 10)

AFNI_GAM(p = 8.6, q = 0.547)

AFNI_WAV(d = 1)

Arguments

d

Duration parameter (seconds) used by SPMG/BLOCK/WAV families

p

Penalty or additional parameter for BLOCK/dmBLOCK

b

Start time (seconds) for multi-basis families (e.g., TENT/CSPLIN/POLY/SIN)

c

Stop time (seconds) for multi-basis families (e.g., TENT/CSPLIN/POLY/SIN)

n

Number of basis functions/knots/degrees for multi-basis families

q

Shape parameter for `AFNI_GAM`

Constructors

- `AFNI_SPMG1(d=1)` – SPMG1 (canonical), duration `d` seconds - `AFNI_SPMG2(d=1)` – SPMG2, duration `d` - `AFNI_SPMG3(d=1)` – SPMG3, duration `d` - `AFNI_BLOCK(d=1, p=1)` – BLOCK, duration `d`, penalty `p` - `AFNI_dmBLOCK(d=1, p=1)` – dmBLOCK, duration `d`, penalty `p` - `AFNI_TENT(b=0, c=18, n=10)` – TENT from `b` to `c` with `n` knots - `AFNI_CSPLIN(b=0, c=18, n=6)` – CSPLIN from `b` to `c` with `n` splines - `AFNI_POLY(b=0, c=18, n=10)` – POLY from `b` to `c` with `n` degrees - `AFNI_SIN(b=0, c=18, n=10)` – SIN from `b` to `c` with `n` harmonics - `AFNI_GAM(p=8.6, q=.547)` – GAM with AFNI default parameters - `AFNI_WAV(d=1)` – WAV (duration parameter)
